WorkItem.ClosedComment: Per the Documentation, you need to mark that enchant available by giving it a green diamond.
WorkItem.Description:
On the http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php .
I'm having an issue with the optimizer option .
"After I click optimize it pops up a small window saying "the following currently equipped items are not available . Mighty Stats is not available , would you like to continue the optimization ?"
Please help , I don't understand why it says that . Does the whole Rawr program not have Chest - Mighty Stats ?

Comments.Message: By 'not available', this mans you have not checked the enchant as available, or the model does not have it added properly.  Please be sure to post your character.xml file and state which model yo were in so we can further assist you in determining the root cause.
